items.title: 1. Welcome to the Work Tour
items.content: Start here to create, edit and collaborate on reports.

items.title: 2. Notifications
items.content: Feed of messages to kepp you up-to-date with recent activity from other users.

items.title: 3. To Do List
items.content: List to remind you of key deadlines and other tasks at need to be completed.

items.title: 4. Reports Filter
items.content: Click here to view the notifications and to do list for a specific report.

items.title: 5. Create new report
items.content: You can start a new report at any time by clicking here.
